data.name: AsyncAPI Online Conference
data.description: It all started like a crazy idea. Since we’re all confined at home due to the coronavirus pandemic, why not organizing a fully-remote online conference to meet each other and have some fun? We asked the community and the response was overwhelmingly positive. We had no choice! Time for some action!

relatedRecords.name: NDC TechTown 2020 - Online Workshop Event
relatedRecords.description: NDC TechTown 31 Aug - 3 Sept 2020. Conference for software developers focusing on software development for products. IoT /Embedded /C++ . NDC TechTown 2020 is a 4 day event with workshops 31 Aug-1 Sept, followed by a 2 day conference 2-3 September. Both the workshops and the conference will be held …

relatedRecords.name: Monkey Fest USA 2020
relatedRecords.description:
MonkeyFestUSA is a brand-new Developers conference focused on covering all aspects of Cross-platform mobile development within the .NET ecosystem.
We will be covering topics like Testing, Automation, Reactive Programming, UI/UX, Maui, Xamarin.Forms, and other related topics.
